questions.question: かぞく（＿）　しゃしんを　とりました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～と 写真をとる - to take a photo with someone

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「かぞくとしゃしんをとりました」 means “I took a photo with my family.”

  • に - direction/indirect object
  • を - direct object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is と.

  • に - direction/indirect object
  • を - direct object marker
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: にほんご（＿）　べんきょうしています。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～を べんきょうする - to study something

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「にほんごをべんきょうしています」 = “I am studying Japanese.”

  • に - used for direction or recipient
  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is を.

  • に - used for direction or recipient
  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker

questions.question: まいあさ　コーヒー（＿）　のみます。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～を のむ - to drink something

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「コーヒーをのみます」 = “I drink coffee.”

  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action
  • に - direction/target marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is を.

  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action
  • に - direction/target marker

questions.question: かばんの　なか（＿）　ふでばこが　あります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に あります - something exists in a location

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「なかにあります」 = “inside (it), there is...”

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker

questions.question: まど（＿）　あけても　いいですか？
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～を あける - to open something

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「まどをあけてもいいですか」 = “Can I open the window?”

  • に - indicates destination/time
  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is を.

  • に - indicates destination/time
  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action

questions.question: つぎの　えき（＿）　おります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～で おります - to get off at a location

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「えきでおります」 = “I get off at the station.”

  • を - object marker
  • に - destination marker (used with “go”)
  • は - topic marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is で.

  • を - object marker
  • に - destination marker (used with “go”)
  • は - topic marker

questions.question: つくえの　うえ（＿）　ほんが　あります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に あります - location of a non-living object

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「うえにあります」 = “There is (a book) on top.”

  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
  • を - object marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
  • を - object marker
